narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant is ready for a class A license to breed and wholesale dogs. 
A check for the appropriate license fee will be mailed to the Regional office. 
No regulated activity may be conducted until the fee is processed and a certificate number has been issued. 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
